meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>sea</kanji> <kanji>army</kanji> are the branch of the military that has boats and does ocean/sea things. What's that? The <vocabulary>navy</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
